name: Perfume Oil Discovery Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description:Explore your signature scents with this set of mini perfume oils, perfectly sized for sampling or on-the-go convenience. Effortlessly switch your fragrance to match your mood. All products are clean and nontoxic..This Set Contains:- 5 x 0.10 oz/ 3 mL perfume oils in No.04 Bois de Balincourt, No.09 Valles de Farney, No.13 Nouvelle Vague, No.14 Icila, Antidris Cassi.Clean & Planet Aware
ingredients: Antidris Cassis:.Fragrance/Parfum, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Citronellol, Geraniol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Eugenol, Limonene, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Citral...No.04 Bois de Balincourt:.Parfum/Fragrance, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosmary) Leaf Extract, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool, Citral...No.09 Vallee de Farney:.Parfum/Fragrance, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Limonene, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosmary) Leaf Extract, Geraniol, Citral, Isoeugenol...No.13 Nouvelle Vague:.Parfum/Fragrance, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Citral...No.14 Icila:.Parfum/Fragrance, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Geraniol, Coumarin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Farnesol, Citronellol...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use roll-on perfume oil any time you desire. Apply to pulse points (neck, chest, and wrist), lightly rolling the ball on the skin to release the fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like oil and solid perfumes, they seem to last a long time on me and are subtle and not up in your nose. I usually dab near my underarm so perfume is not wafting around and only people close to you will smell them. I am not keen on overly sweet florals. I have used the No. 4 Bois de Balincourt previously and love the beautiful cedar scent, however i feel it is too heavy for spring and summer. My take on the other scents in the sampler: No. 09 Vallee de Farney - nice balanced fragrance, citrusy and green and a hint of cedar No. 13 Nouvelle Vague - I probably won't use this one much, although it is nice, the coconut is redolent of the beach/sun lotion. High summer and seaside resorts only No 14 Icila -summery but not too sweet, predominantly jasmine odor Antridris Cassis - I did not like the top notes at first, almost reminded me of insect repellent. But this one gets better as it wears. Unusual, year round scent The small sample size is good for me, I don't use much, and it's perfect for daily use and travel.

reviews.review_title: Fantastic, safe, clean perfume sampler set
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful sample set. I much prefer oil-based perfumes as in my experience they last longer, are less overwhelming, have a consistent scent, and release more fragrance if your temperature increases. The scents are very good, clean, natural, strong but gentle (fragrant, not cloying or overwhelming) and most importantly, non-toxic. Most perfumes contain harmful ingredients listed as fragrance or parfum due to trade secrets, but the lack of regulation means most designer perfumes have endocrine disrupters, carcinogens, and chemicals that can cause repro harm or dysfunction. I was so happy to read that this company is very careful about what it includes in its fragrances. This is also the first time I’ve ever tried a perfume sampler set and not immediately started sneezing at something in it. The company uses beautiful sustainable packaging and makes effort towards carbon offsets and sustainability. The ingredients are chosen to be safe for the environment and for you. The set includes unisex perfumes, although some seem more traditionally masculine or feminine to me. I and the person I am sharing this with both found several scents we really like in the sampler. This would make a great gift, especially for someone who prefers more natural fragrances. I’m looking forward to testing them out for length of wear and layering the different fragrances.
